CustomField.formula: IF( DAY(DATEVALUE(Data_de_entrega__c)) < 10, '0' & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Data_de_entrega__c))), TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Data_de_entrega__c))) ) + "/" + IF( MONTH(DATEVALUE(Data_de_entrega__c)) < 10, '0' & TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Data_de_entrega__c))), TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(Data_de_entrega__c))) ) + "/" + TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Data_de_entrega__c)))
CustomField.label: Data de Entrega formatada
